ygData.subject: RE: Level 38 Song
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been on that death bed more than a few times  but we always had someone to cure poison for those who got nailed. And when I was there w/o the
ygData.messageBody:
I have been on that death bed more than a few times <g> but we always had
someone to cure poison for those who got nailed. And when I was there w/o
the enchanter, I had my hands full keeping multiples pixified - but it would
be good depending on who else was with you.

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal
[mailto:birdman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 1999 2:14 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 38 Song

From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>

On Wed, 15 Dec 1999, James Schuldes wrote:

> And I have been a bad bard <tsk tsk> lev 37 and 38 songs
are waiting for me
> in the bard guild still. Not like the old days where you
really looked
> forward to making a level and getting a good song. <sigh>


I've found the psalm series extremely useful. In fact, I
was invited down
to the spider room/bedroom camp in lower guk, and kicked
myself for not
having bought Psalm of Purity beforehand.

Athren
